methods.description: Gets a similarity key for matching purposes for city name data

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Your Interzoid license API key. Register at www.interzoid.com/register

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City name from which to generate similarity key

apiDescription: This API provides a similarity key used to match with other similar city name data, including for purposes of deduplication, fuzzy matching, or merging of datasets. A much higher match rate will be achieved by matching on the algorithmically generated similarity key rather than the data itself.
apiTitle: Interzoid Get City Match Similarity Key API
